text: The patients were included in this study when they 1 ) were admitted for CAP treatment ; and 2 ) had viral polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) tests performed on the upper respiratory specimen . The exclusion criteria were as follows : 1 ) a respiratory viral PCR test was not performed ; 2 ) they had incomplete records ; 3 ) they were immediately transferred to a tertiary hospital for advanced care ; and 4 ) the primary reason for admission was to manage comorbid diseases .
